verses.verse: וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> came כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <S%H8085><s%> had heard אֲדֹֽנִי־ צֶ֜דֶק <S%H139><s%> Now it came to pass when Adonizedek מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> how לָכַ֨ד <S%H3920><s%> had taken יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעַי֮ <S%H5857><s%> Ai וַיַּחֲרִימָהּ֒ <S%H2763><s%> and had utterly destroyed כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> he עָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> it as he had done לִֽירִיחוֹ֙ <S%H3405><s%> to Jericho וּלְמַלְכָּ֔הּ <S%H4428><s%> and her king כֵּן־ <S%H3651><s%> so עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> so he had done לָעַ֖י <S%H5857><s%> to Ai וּלְמַלְכָּ֑הּ <S%H4428><s%> and her king וְכִ֨י <S%H3588><s%> for הִשְׁלִ֜ימוּ <S%H7999><s%> had made peace יֹשְׁבֵ֤י <S%H3427><s%> and how the inhabitants גִבְעוֹן֙ <S%H1391><s%> of Gibeon אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> with Israel וַיִּֽהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> came בְּקִרְבָּֽם׃ <S%H7130><s%> and were among

וַיִּֽירְא֣וּ <S%H3372><s%> That they feared מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> greatly כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because עִ֤יר <S%H5892><s%> city גְּדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> [was] a great גִּבְע֔וֹן <S%H1391><s%> because Gibeon כְּאַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> as one עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> cities הַמַּמְלָכָ֑ה <S%H4467><s%> of the royal וְכִ֨י <S%H3588><s%> and because הִ֤יא <S%H1931><s%> it was גְדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> and because it [was] greater מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> than הָעַ֔י <S%H5857><s%> than Ai וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲנָשֶׁ֖יהָ <S%H376><s%> men גִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <S%H1368><s%> thereof [were] mighty

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אֲדֹנִי־ צֶ֜דֶק <S%H139><s%> Wherefore Adonizedek מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הוֹהָ֣ם <S%H1944><s%> unto Hoham מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king חֶ֠בְרוֹן <S%H2275><s%> of Hebron וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to פִּרְאָ֨ם <S%H6502><s%> and unto Piram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יַרְמ֜וּת <S%H3412><s%> of Jarmuth וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to יָפִ֧יעַ <S%H3309><s%> and unto Japhia מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king לָכִ֛ישׁ <S%H3923><s%> of Lachish וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to דְּבִ֥יר <S%H1688><s%> and unto Debir מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king עֶגְל֖וֹן <S%H5700><s%> of Eglon לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

עֲלֽוּ־ <S%H5927><s%> Come up אֵלַ֣י <S%H413><s%> to וְעִזְרֻ֔נִי <S%H5826><s%> unto me and help וְנַכֶּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> me that we may smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גִּבְע֑וֹן <S%H1391><s%> Gibeon כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִשְׁלִ֥ימָה <S%H7999><s%> for it hath made peace אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> with Joshua וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> and with בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and with the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיֵּאָסְפ֨וּ <S%H622><s%> gathered themselves together וַֽיַּעֲל֜וּ <S%H5927><s%> and went up חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת ׀ <S%H2568><s%> Therefore the five מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> kings הָאֱמֹרִ֗י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king חֶבְר֤וֹן <S%H2275><s%> of Hebron מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king יַרְמוּת֙ <S%H3412><s%> of Jarmuth מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king לָכִ֣ישׁ <S%H3923><s%> of Lachish מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king עֶגְל֔וֹן <S%H5700><s%> of Eglon הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> with וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַֽחֲנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H4264><s%> they and all their hosts וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against גִּבְע֔וֹן <S%H1391><s%> before Gibeon וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <S%H3898><s%> and made war עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וַיִּשְׁלְח֣וּ <S%H7971><s%> sent אַנְשֵׁי֩ <S%H376><s%> the men גִבְע֨וֹן <S%H1391><s%> of Gibeon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֙ <S%H4264><s%> to the camp הַגִּלְגָּ֣לָה <S%H1537><s%> to Gilgal לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תֶּ֥רֶף <S%H7503><s%> Slack יָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H3027><s%> not thy hand מֵֽעֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H5650><s%> from thy servants עֲלֵ֧ה <S%H5927><s%> come up אֵלֵ֣ינוּ <S%H413><s%> against מְהֵרָ֗ה <S%H4120><s%> to us quickly וְהוֹשִׁ֤יעָה <S%H3467><s%> and save לָּ֙נוּ֙ וְעָזְרֵ֔נוּ <S%H5826><s%> us and help כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for נִקְבְּצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> are gathered together אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H413><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> us for all the kings הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> that dwell הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> in the mountains

וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> ascended יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> So Joshua מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַגִּלְגָּ֗ל <S%H1537><s%> from Gilgal ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> he and all the people הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> of war עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all גִּבּוֹרֵ֥י <S%H1368><s%> with him and all the mighty הֶחָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> men of valour פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> Fear מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> into בְיָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> them into thine hand נְתַתִּ֑ים <S%H5414><s%> them not for I have delivered לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יַעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> of them stand אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> there shall not a man מֵהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like בְּפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וַיָּבֹ֧א <S%H935><s%> therefore came אֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H413><s%> about יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua פִּתְאֹ֑ם <S%H6597><s%> unto them suddenly כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַלַּ֕יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> all night עָלָ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> [and] went up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַגִּלְגָּֽל׃ <S%H1537><s%> from Gilgal

וַיְהֻמֵּ֤ם <S%H2000><s%> discomfited יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> them before יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <S%H5221><s%> and slew מַכָּֽה־ <S%H4347><s%> slaughter גְדוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> them with a great בְּגִבְע֑וֹן <S%H1391><s%> at Gibeon וַֽיִּרְדְּפֵ֗ם <S%H7291><s%> and chased דֶּ֚רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> them along the way מַעֲלֵ֣ה <S%H4609><s%> step בֵית־ חוֹרֹ֔ן <S%H1032><s%> to Bethhoron וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <S%H5221><s%> and smote עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far עֲזֵקָ֖ה <S%H5825><s%> them to Azekah וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far מַקֵּדָֽה׃ <S%H4719><s%> and unto Makkedah

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become בְּנֻסָ֣ם ׀ <S%H5127><s%> And it came to pass as they fled מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from before יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel הֵ֞ם <S%H1992><s%> were at בְּמוֹרַ֤ד <S%H4174><s%> [and] were in the going down בֵּית־ חוֹרֹן֙ <S%H1032><s%> to Bethhoron וַֽיהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD הִשְׁלִ֣יךְ <S%H7993><s%> cast down עֲלֵיהֶם֩ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲבָנִ֨ים <S%H68><s%> stones גְּדֹל֧וֹת <S%H1419><s%> great מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> than הַשָּׁמַ֛יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far עֲזֵקָ֖ה <S%H5825><s%> upon them unto Azekah וַיָּמֻ֑תוּ <S%H4191><s%> and they died רַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> [they were] more אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> than [they] whom מֵ֙תוּ֙ <S%H4191><s%> which died בְּאַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> stones הַבָּרָ֔ד <S%H1259><s%> hail מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הָרְג֛וּ <S%H2026><s%> slew בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> with the sword ס

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then יְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> Then spake יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD בְּי֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day תֵּ֤ת <S%H5414><s%> delivered up יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> when the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> the Amorites לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> and he said לְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שֶׁ֚מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> Sun בְּגִבְע֣וֹן <S%H1391><s%> upon Gibeon דּ֔וֹם <S%H1826><s%> stand thou still וְיָרֵ֖חַ <S%H3394><s%> and thou Moon בְּעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> in the valley אַיָּלֽוֹן׃ <S%H357><s%> of Ajalon

וַיִּדֹּ֨ם <S%H1826><s%> stood still הַשֶּׁ֜מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> And the sun וְיָרֵ֣חַ <S%H3394><s%> and the moon עָמָ֗ד <S%H5975><s%> stayed עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until יִקֹּ֥ם <S%H5358><s%> had avenged גּוֹי֙ <S%H1471><s%> until the people אֹֽיְבָ֔יו <S%H341><s%> themselves upon their enemies הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> [Is] not this כְתוּבָ֖ה <S%H3789><s%> written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book הַיָּשָׁ֑ר <S%H3477><s%> convenient וַיַּעֲמֹ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> stood still הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <S%H8121><s%> the sun בַּחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> in the midst הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not אָ֥ץ <S%H213><s%> and hasted לָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> not to go down כְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day תָּמִֽים׃ <S%H8549><s%> about a whole

וְלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> no הָיָ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> become כַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And there was no day הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> that לְפָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> like that before וְאַחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> it or after לִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <S%H8085><s%> hearkened יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> it that the LORD בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> unto the voice אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of a man כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD נִלְחָ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> fought לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> for Israel פ

וַיָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> with him unto the camp הַגִּלְגָּֽלָה׃ <S%H1537><s%> to Gilgal

וַיָּנֻ֕סוּ <S%H5127><s%> fled חֲמֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> But these five הַמְּלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> kings הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these וַיֵּחָבְא֥וּ <S%H2244><s%> and hid בַמְּעָרָ֖ה <S%H4631><s%> themselves in a cave בְּמַקֵּדָֽה׃ <S%H4719><s%> at Makkedah

וַיֻּגַּ֖ד <S%H5046><s%> And it was told לִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying נִמְצְאוּ֙ <S%H4672><s%> are found חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> The five הַמְּלָכִ֔ים <S%H4428><s%> kings נֶחְבְּאִ֥ים <S%H2244><s%> hid בַּמְּעָרָ֖ה <S%H4631><s%> in a cave בְּמַקֵּדָֽה׃ <S%H4719><s%> at Makkedah

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua גֹּ֛לּוּ <S%H1556><s%> Roll אֲבָנִ֥ים <S%H68><s%> stones גְּדֹל֖וֹת <S%H1419><s%> great אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> upon the mouth הַמְּעָרָ֑ה <S%H4631><s%> of the cave וְהַפְקִ֧ידוּ <S%H6485><s%> and set עָלֶ֛יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H582><s%> men לְשָׁמְרָֽם׃ <S%H8104><s%> by it for to keep

וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעֲמֹ֔דוּ <S%H5975><s%> And stay רִדְפוּ֙ <S%H7291><s%> ye not [but] pursue אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after אֹֽיְבֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H341><s%> your enemies וְזִנַּבְתֶּ֖ם <S%H2179><s%> and smite the hindmost אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתְּנ֗וּם <S%H5414><s%> of them suffer לָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> them not to enter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עָ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5892><s%> into their cities כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for נְתָנָ֛ם <S%H5414><s%> hath delivered יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> them into your hand

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> came כְּכַלּ֨וֹת <S%H3615><s%> had made an end יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> And it came to pass when Joshua וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְהַכּוֹתָ֛ם <S%H5221><s%> of slaying מַכָּ֥ה <S%H4347><s%> slaughter גְדוֹלָֽה־ <S%H1419><s%> great מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> them with a very עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until תֻּמָּ֑ם <S%H8552><s%> till they were consumed וְהַשְּׂרִידִים֙ <S%H8300><s%> that the rest שָׂרְד֣וּ <S%H8277><s%> [which] remained מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> of them וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> of them entered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> cities הַמִּבְצָֽר׃ <S%H4013><s%> into fenced

וַיָּשֻׁבוּ֩ <S%H7725><s%> returned כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמַּחֲנֶ֧ה <S%H4264><s%> to the camp אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> to Joshua מַקֵּדָ֖ה <S%H4719><s%> at Makkedah בְּשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> No חָרַ֞ץ <S%H2782><s%> none moved לִבְנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> against any אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְשֹׁנֽוֹ׃ <S%H3956><s%> his tongue

וַיַּ֣עֲשׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> And they did כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> so וַיֹּצִ֣יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> so and brought forth אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמֵ֛שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> those five הַמְּלָכִ֥ים <S%H4428><s%> kings הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמְּעָרָ֑ה <S%H4631><s%> unto him out of the cave אֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king חֶבְרוֹן֙ <S%H2275><s%> of Hebron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king יַרְמ֔וּת <S%H3412><s%> of Jarmuth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king לָכִ֖ישׁ <S%H3923><s%> of Lachish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [and] the king עֶגְלֽוֹן׃ <S%H5700><s%> of Eglon

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽירְא֖וּ <S%H3372><s%> unto them Fear וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּחָ֑תּוּ <S%H2865><s%> not nor be dismayed חִזְק֣וּ <S%H2388><s%> be strong וְאִמְצ֔וּ <S%H553><s%> and of good courage כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for כָ֗כָה <S%H3602><s%> thus יַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> do יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> for thus shall the LORD לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all אֹ֣יְבֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H341><s%> to all your enemies אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you נִלְחָמִ֥ים <S%H3898><s%> against whom ye fight אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיַּכֵּ֨ם <S%H5221><s%> smote יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And afterward כֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that וַיְמִיתֵ֔ם <S%H4191><s%> them and slew וַיִּתְלֵ֕ם <S%H8518><s%> them and hanged עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> them on five עֵצִ֑ים <S%H6086><s%> trees וַיִּֽהְי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> become תְּלוּיִ֥ם <S%H8518><s%> and they were hanging עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָעֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> upon the trees עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the evening

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> came לְעֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H6256><s%> And it came to pass at the time בּ֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> of the going down הַשֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> of the sun צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> [that] Joshua וַיֹּֽרִידוּם֙ <S%H3381><s%> and they took them down מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> over הָעֵצִ֔ים <S%H6086><s%> off the trees וַיַּ֨שְׁלִכֻ֔ם <S%H7993><s%> and cast אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַמְּעָרָ֖ה <S%H4631><s%> them into the cave אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> they נֶחְבְּאוּ־ <S%H2244><s%> wherein they had been hid שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> themselves וַיָּשִׂ֜מוּ <S%H7760><s%> and laid אֲבָנִ֤ים <S%H68><s%> stones גְּדֹלוֹת֙ <S%H1419><s%> great עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> mouth הַמְּעָרָ֔ה <S%H4631><s%> in the cave's עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against עֶ֖צֶם <S%H6106><s%> [which remain] until this very הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this פ

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַקֵּדָה֩ <S%H4719><s%> Makkedah לָכַ֨ד <S%H3920><s%> took יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיַּכֶּ֣הָ <S%H5221><s%> and smote לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> it with the edge חֶרֶב֮ <S%H2719><s%> of the sword וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכָּהּ֒ <S%H4428><s%> and the king הֶחֱרִ֣ם <S%H2763><s%> thereof he utterly destroyed אוֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every הַנֶּ֙פֶשׁ֙ <S%H5315><s%> them and all the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֔הּ לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no הִשְׁאִ֖יר <S%H7604><s%> that [were] therein he let שָׂרִ֑יד <S%H8300><s%> none remain וַיַּ֙עַשׂ֙ <S%H6213><s%> and he did לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king מַקֵּדָ֔ה <S%H4719><s%> of Makkedah כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> as he did לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho

וַיַּעֲבֹ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> passed יְ֠הוֹשֻׁעַ <S%H3091><s%> Then Joshua וְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel עִמּ֛וֹ <S%H5973><s%> against מִמַּקֵּדָ֖ה <S%H4719><s%> from Makkedah לִבְנָ֑ה <S%H3841><s%> with him unto Libnah וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <S%H3898><s%> and fought עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against לִבְנָֽה׃ <S%H3841><s%> against Libnah

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> delivered יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אוֹתָ֜הּ <S%H853><s%> בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> thereof into the hand יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכָּהּ֒ <S%H4428><s%> it also and the king וַיַּכֶּ֣הָ <S%H5221><s%> and he smote לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> it with the edge חֶ֗רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every הַנֶּ֙פֶשׁ֙ <S%H5315><s%> and all the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֔הּ לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הִשְׁאִ֥יר <S%H7604><s%> that [were] therein he let בָּ֖הּ שָׂרִ֑יד <S%H8300><s%> none remain וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> in it but did לְמַלְכָּ֔הּ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> thereof as he did לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho ס

וַיַּעֲבֹ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> passed יְ֠הוֹשֻׁעַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel עִמּ֛וֹ <S%H5973><s%> from מִלִּבְנָ֖ה <S%H3841><s%> from Libnah לָכִ֑ישָׁה <S%H3923><s%> with him unto Lachish וַיִּ֣חַן <S%H2583><s%> and encamped עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <S%H3898><s%> against it and fought בָּֽהּ׃

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> delivered יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לָכִ֜ישׁ <S%H3923><s%> Lachish בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַֽיִּלְכְּדָהּ֙ <S%H3920><s%> which took בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> it on the second וַיַּכֶּ֣הָ <S%H5221><s%> and smote לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> it with the edge חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every הַנֶּ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and all the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֑הּ כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> that [were] therein according to all that he had done לְלִבְנָֽה׃ <S%H3841><s%> to Libnah פ

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then עָלָ֗ה <S%H5927><s%> came up הֹרָם֙ <S%H2036><s%> Then Horam מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king גֶּ֔זֶר <S%H1507><s%> of Gezer לַעְזֹ֖ר <S%H5826><s%> to help אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לָכִ֑ישׁ <S%H3923><s%> Lachish וַיַּכֵּ֤הוּ <S%H5221><s%> smote יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> and Joshua וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> him and his people עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בִּלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> no הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <S%H7604><s%> until he had left ל֖וֹ שָׂרִֽיד׃ <S%H8300><s%> him none remaining

וַיַּכֶּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> smote יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> So Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֡רֶץ <S%H776><s%> all the country הָהָר֩ <S%H2022><s%> of the hills וְהַנֶּ֨גֶב <S%H5045><s%> and of the south וְהַשְּׁפֵלָ֜ה <S%H8219><s%> and of the vale וְהָאֲשֵׁד֗וֹת <S%H794><s%> and of the springs וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַלְכֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4428><s%> and all their kings לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no הִשְׁאִ֖יר <S%H7604><s%> he left שָׂרִ֑יד <S%H8300><s%> none remaining וְאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַנְּשָׁמָה֙ <S%H5397><s%> all that breathed הֶחֱרִ֔ים <S%H2763><s%> but utterly destroyed כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֔ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיַּכֵּ֧ם <S%H5221><s%> smote יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua מִקָּדֵ֥שׁ בַּרְנֵ֖עַ <S%H6947><s%> them from Kadeshbarnea וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far עַזָּ֑ה <S%H5804><s%> even unto Gaza וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and all the country גֹּ֖שֶׁן <S%H1657><s%> of Goshen וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far גִּבְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H1391><s%> even unto Gibeon
